timeAnchors.definition: The point at which a subject is assigned to a treatment arm and is no longer considered a screen failure.
timeAnchors.sourceText: Screen Failure: A subject who is screened but is not treated or randomized

repetitions.sourceText: Requirement to apply the same pregnancy testing in both arms, throughout the study

traversalConstraints.sourceText: [{'condition': 'Subject experiences AE requiring discontinuation', 'path': ['DISCONTINUATION_OF_STUDY_TREATMENT', 'EARLY_TERMINATION_VISIT']}, {'condition': 'Subject is lost to follow-up', 'path': ['LOST_TO_FOLLOW_UP_PROCEDURES']}, {'condition': 'Withdrawal of informed consent', 'path': ['WITHDRAWAL_OF_CONSENT_PROCEDURES']}]

executionTypes.rationale: WINDOW signals: 1; EPISODE signals: 1; RECURRING signals: 4
The screening phase is a one-time assessment period to determine eligibility prior to randomization.
Treatment assignment occurs as a single event at the start of the study.
The protocol describes a 96-week study with scheduled doses of brolucizumab or laser at specific study visits.
Assessments are scheduled to repeat at multiple study visits throughout the 96-week duration.
Section 6.5 indicates conditional workflows for adjusting treatment based on specific clinical criteria or safety findings.

endpointAlgorithms.name: Primary: Change from Baseline in BCVA
endpointAlgorithms.algorithm: BCVA_Week_54 - BCVA_Baseline (excluding data after confounding alternative DR/DME treatments)
endpointAlgorithms.successCriteria: Lower limit of the two-sided 95% CI for the least square mean difference (brolucizumab - PRP) > -4 letters
endpointAlgorithms.sourceText: The objective related to the primary endpoint is to demonstrate non-inferiority of brolucizumab versus PRP with respect to the change from Baseline in BCVA at Week 54, assuming a non-inferiority margi

endpointAlgorithms.name: First Key Secondary: Proportion of subjects with no PDR
endpointAlgorithms.algorithm: (Count of subjects with no PDR at Week 54 / Total subjects in treatment arm)
endpointAlgorithms.successCriteria: Superiority of brolucizumab vs PRP via CMH test (one-sided p < 0.025) after primary non-inferiority is established
endpointAlgorithms.sourceText: The objective related to first key secondary endpoint is to demonstrate superiority of brolucizumab versus PRP with respect to increasing the proportion of subjects with no PDR at Week 54.

endpointAlgorithms.name: Other Key Secondary: Proportion of subjects with center-involved DME
inputs: Center-involved DME status up to Week 54
endpointAlgorithms.algorithm: (Count of subjects with center-involved DME / Total subjects in treatment arm)
endpointAlgorithms.successCriteria: Superiority of brolucizumab vs PRP via CMH test (one-sided p < 0.025) after primary and first key secondary superiority are established
endpointAlgorithms.sourceText: The objective related to the other key secondary endpoint is to demonstrate superiority of brolucizumab versus PRP with respect to reducing the proportion of subjects with center-involved DME up to We

derivedVariables.name: Change from Baseline in BCVA at Week 54
derivedVariables.derivationRule: Week 54 BCVA value - Baseline BCVA value
derivedVariables.baselineDefinition: Last non-missing value prior to randomization/treatment
derivedVariables.imputationRule: ANCOVA model (Primary estimand excludes confounding effect of alternative DR/DME treatments)

derivedVariables.name: Proportion of subjects with no PDR at Week 54
derivedVariables.derivationRule: Count of subjects with DRSS score indicating no PDR / Total subjects in analysis set
derivedVariables.baselineDefinition: Presence of PDR at Baseline as per inclusion criteria

derivedVariables.name: Proportion of subjects with center-involved DME up to Week 54
derivedVariables.derivationRule: Count of subjects developing center-involved DME at any point through Week 54 / Total subjects
derivedVariables.baselineDefinition: Absence of center-involved DME at Baseline

derivedVariables.name: Area under the curve in change from Baseline in BCVA
derivedVariables.derivationRule: Area under the curve (AUC) calculation of change from baseline values across all visits up to Week 54 and Week 96
derivedVariables.baselineDefinition: Last non-missing value prior to treatment

derivedVariables.name: Change from Baseline in ETDRS DRSS score
derivedVariables.baselineDefinition: Last non-missing score based on 7-field CFP prior to treatment

derivedVariables.name: Proportion of subjects developing vision-threatening complications associated with DR
derivedVariables.derivationRule: Count of subjects with one or more vision-threatening complications / Total subjects
